title: Land Of Sorrow
opening: Gra's betrayal of Altea years earlier had come as a shock, of course, until that day they attacked Marth's kingdom in the name of Dolhr, Gra had been a trustworthy neighbor and ally. While the Altean army was out on an expedition, Gra struck from the rearm annihilating the Altean soldiers, killing Marth's father, King Cornelius and stealing Falchion, the blade of light. It was a crushing blow. Much time had passed since that sad day, and much had changed. Now it was Marth's turn to descend on Gra Bastion, and face King Jiol, the man who had robbed him of his father.

intro.speaker: Enemy Soldier
intro.line: King Jiol, they're ‘ere! The League is outside the Bastion!

intro.speaker: Jiol
intro.line: League? How dare you call them that! I see naught but a prince of ghosts and his pack of rebels.

intro.speaker: Enemy Soldier
intro.line: B-beggin' your pardon, sire, but everybody calls 'em the League now. Altea and Aurelis and Archanea...The League of A's, you might say!

intro.speaker: Jiol
intro.line: Shut up, you idiot! Hmmm...So the princeling has returned. And he leads all the might of Archanea, with the Fire Emblem in hand...Did you send to Dolhr for reinforcements like I asked?

intro.speaker: Enemy Soldier
intro.line: Of course, sire. Macedon's pegasus knights are on their way.

intro.speaker: Jiol
intro.line: Pegasus knights?! How am I supposed to stop the Lea- those REBELS with a handful of...of winged ponies! Send another messenger! Tell them we need Camus's Sable Order, or...or Michalis's Dragoons! Blast...I deserve the same protection as the rest of the Empire! Betraying Altean was Gharnef's idea! Let...let him fight the brat! Don't just stand there, DO something! I don't want to die! Do you understand?

visit.speaker: Young Man
visit.line: They say that shops will all give you half off if you have a silver card… Sounds too good to be true if you ask me!

visit.speaker: Young Man
visit.line: I heard that once you reach LV.10, you can change jobs! Cavaliers can become paladins, mercenaries can become heroes… There's more but I forgot!

visit.speaker: Camus
visit.line: Are you Prince Marth of Altea? I have a request of you. This tome belongs to one Bishop Boah of Archanea. Heimler of Grust got hold of it. It has come to be in my possession. Please return it to the bishop for me. One more thing… Watch over Princess Nyna. Your attention to this would put my mind at ease. I shall take my leave of you. We will meet again…

recruit-talk.speaker: Palla
recruit-talk.line: I am pleased to meet you, Prince Marth. I am Palla of the Whitewings. As soon as we heard that Princess Maria was safe, my sister Catria and I left Macedon. Just as she promised you, Catria and I will join your fight alongside Princess Minerva. However, our youngest sister Est still has not returned from Grust. If she makes it back, the three of us will show you how we can light up the battlefield together!

recruit-talk.speaker: Catria
recruit-talk.line: Hello, Prince Marth. It has been a while. Do you remember me? I am Catria. I was waiting for Princess Minerva's order before joining your army. I look forward to fighting together. I will do all that I can.

recruit-talk.speaker: Midia
recruit-talk.line: Astram! So this is what you've been up to...

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: Midia! You're really here! I'm so glad you're safe. I've missed you...

recruit-talk.speaker: Midia
recruit-talk.line: It seems you don't know yet... Altea's army has liberated the capital. We were set free and have joined their fight. There is no need to cooperate with the enemy any longer!

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: What wonderful news! I will resume my fight against Dolhr!

recruit-talk.speaker: Midia
recruit-talk.line: We can be together again! Promise me that you will never leave my side.

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: Midia... In the time since we last met...

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: I can't help but notice how you've matured while we were apart...

recruit-battle.speaker: Astram
recruit-battle.line: I’m sorry… This is for my lover… Forgive me…

recruit-battle.speaker: Catria
recruit-battle.line: Wait, I’m looking for Lord Marth.

recruit-battle.speaker: Palla
recruit-battle.line: Wait, I’m looking for Lord Marth.

boss.speaker: Jiol
boss.line: Grrr... Altean rabble! I should have killed you stragglers back when I had the chance!

boss.speaker: Jiol
boss.line: Thus falls... the mighty kingdom... of Gra... My daughter... Sheena... you must... for me...

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: We searched every inch of the castle but could not find the blade of light… As the rumors suggest, Gharnef must have taken it to Khadein.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I see... Without Falchion, we cannot hope to defeat Medeus. Altea is so close…but we must go to Khadein instead. Disappointing, but I have to tell the troops.
